name: Dodgers Online! (Prototype)
description:
Dodgers Online! Is a third-person multiplayer sport game in which two teams battle each other for the victory, following the majority of the classic Dodgeball rules. 

A big difference with usual dodgeball games is the ability to fly, which brings the gameplay on a new level of freedom! There are also different kinds of balls, each one with unique abilities for you to find out! The game is still a work in progress, a prototype basicly, so are most likely to encounter a variety of “unintended features”.  Still, we think Dodgers Online! is an enjoyable experience with friends, so give it a try and have fun!

Team Work Ivan Emanuele Cimino Giuliana Muto Giovanni Musacchio External collaborators Voice: Carmine Squitieri
